item.title: Let Students Use AI
item.description: I originally wrote this post for an essay contest at my school. It won the third place prize and was published in a campus magazine under a slightly different title. I’ll admit that my discussion is rather parochial in its focus on Williams, but my main claims easily generalize to other institutions. As always, I invite comments, objections, and feedback. Williams is due for a deep rethink on the role of artificial intelligence (hereafter AI) in college classes.
